sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Dictionary Upgrade (Aug Release v2)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryArr = [{
    'query': 'element=article^name=sn_shop_shopnow_content',
    'attribute': {
        'column_label': 'Article (deprecated)'
    }
}];

var choiceArr = [{
    'query': 'name=sn_shop_shopnow_content^value=document^element=type',
    'attribute': {
        'inactive': true
    }
}];

var shopPropArr = [{
    'query': 'name=sn_shop_properties',
    'attribute': {
        'label': 'Properties (deprecated)'
    }
}];

var propModuleArr = [{
    'query': 'sys_id=0ba54a5653d400104c16ddeeff7b12a3',
    'attribute': {
        'active': false
    }
}];

dictionaryArr.forEach(updateDictionary);
choiceArr.forEach(updateChoice);

var shopPropGr = new GlideRecord('sn_shop_properties');
if (shopPropGr.isValid()) {
    shopPropArr.forEach(updateShopPropertiesTable);
    propModuleArr.forEach(deactivateModule);
}

function updateDictionary(obj) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    while (dictionaryGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dictionaryGr, obj.attribute);
}

function updateChoice(hintObj) {
    var documenationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
    documenationGr.addEncodedQuery(hintObj.query);
    documenationGr.query();
    while (documenationGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(documenationGr, hintObj.attribute);
}

function updateShopPropertiesTable(obj) {
    var dbObjGr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
    dbObjGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dbObjGr.query();
    while (dbObjGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dbObjGr, obj.attribute);
}

function deactivateModule(obj) {
    var moduleGr = new GlideRecord('sys_app_module');
    moduleGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    moduleGr.query();
    while (moduleGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(moduleGr, obj.attribute);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-08-24 07:55:44</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>34329427eb823010c37986605252281e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Dictionary Upgrade (Aug Release v2)</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_34329427eb823010c37986605252281e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-08-30 08:43:24</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
